content:
That sounds like a great plan! Grouping some plants together and scattering others around the room can create a beautiful and visually interesting display. And congratulations on scoring an amazing deal on a plush area rug from Overstock during their Black Friday sale! A beautiful rug can really tie a room together and provide a comfortable and cozy atmosphere.

Remember to choose plants that complement each other in terms of size, shape, and texture, and consider the lighting and temperature requirements of each plant when deciding where to place them. You can also add some decorative elements, such as planters, vases, or plant stands, to enhance the overall aesthetic of your plant display.

Also, don't forget to take care of your plants and make sure they're getting enough water, light, and nutrients. With a little TLC, your plants will thrive and add a touch of natural beauty to your living room.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance on plant care or interior design, feel free to ask!
